Reviews.Title: “Location was the best thing about it”
Reviews.Author: sorlie324
Reviews.Content: We stayed in June 2012 and I was so excited to finally get to our condo but when we got there we had a hard time finding the key. When we finally got in the condo it was much smaller than it appeared in the pictures. The condo might be not so bad if the people cleaning it for the owners knew how to clean but the comforter had chocolate left on it from previous renters and the floors were dirty. They're were not enough clean blankets either and every day I woke up with a headache from the mold in the air conditioner. The kitchenette was nice and the owners who were out of town and tried to fix any problems we had. I agree totally with the review too about the pool key and the fitness center smells so musty I couldn't breathe to even try to work out. For the price though it was overall OK. I was happy to be on the beach in a place that didn't have any bedbugs with this day and age. Even the expensive condos and resorts are getting them. The pools were clean and nice too. I looked in some of the other condo windows and some were much better and some were much much worse. Overall even with the problems we had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “VRBO 202719 OR UNIT #241”
Reviews.Author: chrissyallen1
Reviews.Content: **** Renter Beware!!**** You get what you pay for! The price for this condo was great! The location, beach,pools, and size were perfect. It is very private and secluded! The locks to get into the pools and onto the beach were a pain because you only have one key for your whole party. Now for the not so perfect: i stayed in this condo from 7/23-7/30. When i arrived there was an overwhelming smell of bleach in the condo. We had to leave doors and windows open for the entire first day because our eyes were burning so bad from the fumes. You would think because of the smell it would have been very clean but that was not the case. The bedroom floors were discusting. There was hair and i am assuming comet all over the floors. This white powder would not all come up. We swept the condo probably 5 times before we felt like we could walk around without shoes. We even bought a sponge mop and pinesol to clean the floors. I was scared to let my toddler walk around out of my sight due to the chemicals under the sinks and in the floor. The washing machine smelled like mildew and has mold growing in it. The sheets were dirty and we had to wash all of them. The towels had long black hairs all over them so they had to be washed as well. The iron did not work, the can opener did not work , there was no dvd player. Like i said the price was great, but i was very disappointed in the cleanliness of the condo. I would not stay again due to the dirt. If i would not have paid in advance i would not have stayed after seeing how dirty it was. It was not small kid friendly as advertised. On a positive note the owners were very friendly and responded to let us check in and out promptly.

Reviews.Title: “MUCH better- new management”
Reviews.Author: Monty P
Reviews.Content: This place had become pretty bad under the old management, but under the new folks, it is great! Absolutely best beach and pool deck in Daytona. Each condo individually owned- some uber luxurious, some average. Ask when placing reservations. Highly recommend for location and value.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location improving having money spent on it so worth a stay”
Reviews.Author: chrissym122
Reviews.Content: Having owned a condo here and now sold we have been staying at Ocean Jewels a good few years. Just been back and we were pleased to find the complex much improved. Location perfect right on the beach, well tended gardens, clean pools and now have security gates. Self catering but there are numerous restaurants to choose from. You need a hire car to get around this part of the 'sunshine' state.

Reviews.Title: “Just plain relaxing”
Reviews.Author: sarah v
Reviews.Content: My family and I spent a week at this beautiful condo-tel. When we checked in the front desk manager was so helpful and she gave us a deal as my husband is a retired vet. When going to the room it was clean and well maintained. After getting comfy we went back down to the desk where there was another wonderful lady who told us some great places to visit and the best places for dinner. We will be back several times a year!

Reviews.Title: “great bang for your buck”
Reviews.Author: bill b
Reviews.Content: was a lovely place has grills you can cook on 2 adult pools one large kiddie pool nice rooms and the front desk manager krystal is a great help and lovely young lady close to everything race track main street was a joy to stay there and will be going back

Reviews.Title: “Family Oriented - Great Price - Right on Beach!”
Reviews.Author: C230Kcoupe
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this condo for 8 days. No complaints at all, just a little noisy due to construction next door and some late night guests checking in. No big deal though, nothing that kept me from sleeping or enjoying myself. This is not a Travel Lodge any longer. The condo's are owned by individuals and rented out. I noticed that a few of the people laying out by the pool knew each other, so I'm guessing that they live here or are frequent guests and have become friends over the years. If you have children, this is nice because it is gated and you can't get out to the beach unless you type a code into the gate. You also could not get back in to the condo without a code, keeping out unregistered guests. I liked it because we have a very curious 7 year old that will go wherever he wants and we have to watch him constantly. We were in a bottom unit. This was nice because the kids could go to the pool just outside the door and we could watch them from the kitchen while we prepared lunch or dinner. No lifeguard on duty, but our kids are fine in the pool with minimal supervision. Great place to stay and I would recommend it to anyone with or without families. Close to everything and very convenient to the ocean!

Reviews.Title: “perfect”
Reviews.Author: 37countries
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 months at Ocean Jewels. (for the first time) It is no longer a travel lodge..I believe most people own these condos now and either live there or rent them out.. The resort is clean and beautiful..It is right on the ocean!!!! The view is amazing..Has 2 pools also, lots of grills for all to use..It is so convenient. You can simply walk to numerous fabulous restaurants, shopping, the famous boardwalk, and Main St. for bikers week!!! You can also walk to a big cinema playing movies practically all day. We picked this place sight unseen for the reasonable price especially being on the ocean...Just search for it and hopefully you will have many choices from many different owners.

Reviews.Title: “manager a scam artist”
Reviews.Author: jacquiegiles
Reviews.Content: Upon our arrival to the ocean jewels we tried to use the code to get into our room, that Stephanie Jones, the manager of our unit gave us and of course it didn't work after talking to the security guard he told us that she gave us the code for the gate to the beach so after a couple of phone calls we managed to get into our room. We had a nice unit with two baths, the toilet in one bath almost overflowed when we used it and we couldn't use it and in the other one we had to fill the tank by hand because it filled so slowly. I called Stephanie that night and got no answer, of course, so I continued calling the next day, again no answer. Now it is Sunday, we arrived Friday eve. I called again saying I might need to contact the owner because I was worried about the toilet that was at the top of the rim, surprise! she called back in 10 minutes and said she would have maintenence man there the next day well he never came till tuesday and then they blamed the broken toilet on us, we also were threatend with having our car towed because she didn't have a parking permit for us which was to be in our room then Stephanie told us we had too many in our room and had to move 2 people out, she was the one that told us to bring blow up beds for the 2 extras. If you are considering renting a condo at ocean jewels do NOT rent one thru Stephanie Jones unless you want these kinds of hassles. My card was charged $85.00 for a broken toilet that was broken upon our arrival. ocean jewels is a nice place just need to beware of who the manager is that you rent thru

Reviews.Title: “A++++++”
Reviews.Author: mookyp
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in Dec. 2008. Got an oceanview room w/ balcony, kitchen & spacious size for only $35. One of the front desk clerks was really friendly, the other one was a [--]. Perfect location (directly on the beach; across the bridge from Downtown; 1 mile from bus station). Would definitely visit again!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely for the price and scenery”
Reviews.Author: themellowcanary
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay , the front desk was polite, the rooms were clean, you step out for a couple of hours and you caome back, the rooms are done. The staff that we met was very corteous, we want to thank our front desk and staff that kept our visit pleasant, the veiw to the beach was great. Everyone was corteous even the guests. The parking was safe and well lit, the place was so quiet at night, I slept like a log. Thanks so much for taking care of us. Bigup to the STAFF at the Ocean Jewels.

Reviews.Title: “fun was had by all”
Reviews.Author: buffalo56
Reviews.Content: My family of 4 stayed at the ocean jewel for a few days to start our vacation, although our room was not right on the beach, I could see it from my front porch, just beautiful. It had 2 pools (1 heated, 1 cold and 1 kids) and I used the heated, deep, clean and just really nice pool. It was right on the ocean with a combination fence so we felt safe. The beach was very clean. Only problem was the condo owners complaining about all that was wrong "take your skirt off sally" every day same conversation and same people. But all the others looked relaxed. Close to the rental areas for 4 wheeler which was perfect.

Reviews.Title: “No Longer a Travelodge Property. Don't stay here!”
Reviews.Author: RaceReady
Reviews.Content: We arrived for the Daytona 500, only to find this hotel was no longer a Travelodge. I made the reservation on the Travelodge website, and I'm very disappointed that they didn't call me before my trip to tell me I wasn't going to stay at a Travelodge property. Once we got the key to the room, we understood why Travelodge pulled out. This place is a dive. When we arrived at 1 p.m., the office staff were on their way to getting pretty liqoured up. On our way to the room, we passed some "employees" that looked like ex-cons. Concerned about finding lodging the week of the race, we decided to stick it out. It was downhill from there. The carpet was FILTHY in the "junior suite" we were in; the dirt came off the furniture onto your clothing. The "non-smoking" room smelled like stale smoke, and we kept smelling "something else". We found out what that "something else" was the next day when we went to turn on the A/C, and found that someone had puked inside the air conditioner, and maintenance hadn't bothered to clean it out. We were given a new room, but the only room they had was a regular room with two double beds (when we were supposed to have a junior suite with a king bed). The second room was definitely cleaner, however, they wouldn't discount the room (even though it was a smaller room, and we had to sleep in separate beds). During our stay, someone jumped off a balcony into the parking lot. This person was clearly using; when I attempted to help, I could tell she was hallucinating. Very unsavory location/guests. My advice: if you want to stay beachside, stay at the hotels on NORTH Atlantic Avenue. The only decent looking hotel on SOUTH Atlantic was the Best Western Tiki. P.S. I stuck my hand in the pools; they're cold.

Reviews.Title: “Great Condo, Terrible Management”
Reviews.Author: MrPhilly
Reviews.Content: We rented one of the condo units at the Ocean Jewels Resort in Dayonta Beach last summer. The management group that runs the front desk is atrocious, but thankfully when you rent from an OWNER you don't even have to deal with them. We stayed in Room 408, and it was clean and comfortable. The kids loved the 2 pools and in August the beach was empty except for the lifeguard.

Reviews.Title: “Please Everyone You Must Read This Travel Lodge Daytona Beach Fla”
Reviews.Author: babydoll333
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at Travel Lodge located In Daytona Beach Florida located 935 S. Altantic Ave. Well to my surprise I thought people who worked at the motel valued word of honor not in this case. I paid two nights with debit card and was told by the manger could pay cash for the rest of the money but however I got a call from the bank that somebody from motel already took money out that was the first day I was there. My account was over drawn due to them not telling me of there actions.Far as there word of honor it was broken and they did not offer me any kind of help to resolve this matter. After they get the information off of your debit card they do not need your card to get back into your account because you gave them the information already. Just a word of warning pay attention to your bank ac.count do not use a debit card or go to this hotel. Thank you

Reviews.Title: “Flop House”
Reviews.Author: EverydayVacation
Reviews.Content: We booked this place as a stop over on our way to Miami to catch a cruise. I was severely disappointed. I was promised wi-fi and it is only accessible in their tiny lobby area. I was promised a ocean view and I got to look at the parking lot. They promised a on-site restaurant and there was nothing. I really did not feel all that safe here, the door had obviously been broken into before and repaired. There are several buildings included in this property. The parking lots are dark and I never saw any police or security patrol. They are also without elevators so be prepared to lug everything up several sets of stairs. They only allow one parking space per room. Others are towed. I came to the conclusion that this is a spring break motel. They charge young people $250 deposit plus they count all towels, rags, etc. and charge for bad staining, etc. as well if one comes up short. There is a $50 fee if they feel you made the room too dirty for housekeeping. I really have a hard time believing anyone pays the rack rate on the door of $350 a night. This place is old but clean for the most part. If you just need a clean place to spend a few hours, this may be just what you are looking for. Don't expect anything more and you should be fine.

Reviews.Title: “Good price, big room, friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: kirbykirb
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised about this hotel room, first time I ever had to get one and I've heard horror stories, on the news and such about them being dirty/unsanitary and that you should always get a 5star..etc. But, me stumbling in at 3am at this place was very lucky..I tried a few other hotels down the 1A and they wouldn't rent cause I was under 21, some under 25. I came here, pretty much no questions asked besides asked for my license + a credit card. I got a suite for basically 2 nights for a one nights price at 60$ on Saturday early morning (Very early, heh). Everything is very clean, atleast to my eyes. Clean sheets on the bed, tv works fine (though the one in my room has a lil color issue unless you wait a few minutes.) and very cold AC! The living room I have is pratically, with my suite having 2 tv's (one in the bedroom, a bigger one in the living room.) as well as a frige and a stove w/ 2 bathrooms. Of course the fridge isn't prestocked (good thing I guess!!) Overall, for a first time renting a room and being under 21..this place is great. I heard it's a 3 star hotel, so of course there isn't going to be people waiting in line for your commands (which didn't really matter in my case, only a backpack)! I really will come back here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel for family vactioners”
Reviews.Author: varda1015
Reviews.Content: I have seen reviews for this hotel that complain of bugs. The only things we seen was a excellent ocean view, wonderful staff, surf shops all around us, and a convenient pizza shop. We booked our stay here due to the fact we were traveling 1051 miles in a car with 4 children. We wanted to spend more money on leisure activities than our room. We arrived 4 hours earlier than expected and they let us go ahead and check in without charging us a fee. You are within walking distance of Main street pier.

Reviews.Title: “This is a Hotel?????”
Reviews.Author: dossy51
Reviews.Content: The place is just plain dirty. Rooms are not properly serviced by the "housekeepers"??? Someone named "Erica" is just a rude [-] to everyone at night. Some guy named Marion at the bar was drunk for 3 days. Some guy named Dan would be heard shouting curses from somewhere over the front desk. The place is a total zoo! [--] and prostitutes everywhere! Some of them seem to be employees. Police there on and off all night long. Security guard sleeping on sofa in lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Great for the price but rented a private condo.”
Reviews.Author: NashvilleTyler
Reviews.Content: Actually I was surprised how good the stay was. Don't know if this is the right place to put this review but it was at Ocean Jewels! We rented for a week with a private owner. The condo was nice, clean and fun to stay in. The owner had made it a LOT better than a standard hotel room. The grounds and pools are beautiful! There is actually a yard with grass like the old days. All kinds of palm trees and the beach is right there. Anyway maybe this will help someone renting there make up their mind. I liked it. Great for families. Not far from everything but still far enough to be relaxing. From the older reviews I know there has been construction the last few months but all that is done now. Every thing looks nice. Will say I have no idea about the front desk since we didn't have to use it. Look for a private owner rental! First time I did and it really worked. Just be sure to talk to the owner on the phone. Tyler.

Reviews.Title: “The Jewel is a Jewel”
Reviews.Author: goldenhawk57
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a 4 day stay at Travelodge Ocean Jewel. We found them extremely accomodating to our 88 yr. old mother. The room was clean and exactly what we required. The swimming pools were clean and had enough tables for everyone. We noticed the security officer making several rounds of the area to assure our safety. The staff was very helpful, friendly, and attentive. I get a little worried when I book a hotel online. Usually it sugar coats what they really look like and what they offer. I found this hotel (even though the reviews I read were a little outdated,) up to the standards as shown online. I will book with them again in the future and suggest them to anyone planning a stay at Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Mixed Review...Would Stay again just for the cost savings”
Reviews.Author: mlb_22
Reviews.Content: We chose Travelodge because we stayed at one the night before that was awesome...well, needless to say not all are Awesome! For starters, while being waited on at the front desk a crackhoe decided to come in and apply for a job. I was surprised when the manager came out to get something from the front desk but didn't tell her to leave or just talk to her so she would quit disturbing the guests, maybe that would have been too smart I don't know. Anyway, the lady waiting on us was extremely nice and apologetic. I told her it wasn't her fault who walks in the hotel and that her manager should have handled it instead but who am I? A few minutes after being in the room our phone rang and it was the Hotel Lobby asking us if the room was ok, I was impressed with that because they didn't have to do that. The room was "just ok". I've stayed in worse and a whole lot better. The view was spectacular, it was upstairs and right in front of the beach...but then again I wasn't sleeping outside. The bathroom was a little on the gross side, stains and mildew. The toilet seat was up when I walked in, that disgusts me immediately. Also, the shower head dripped all night even after we put a death grip on the faucet, it didn't help. So instead of counting sheep it was water droplets...very soothing. The room had a kitchenette in it which I didn't use, I'm too sanitary oriented to use forks and pans and ice cube trays that may have been purchased at the Salvation Army...some things should only be used if they are brand new, but that's my opinion. The parking lot was dimly lighted which didn't bother me much until I got out of the car and looked up to see I was being watched by 5 Porto Ricans which were all intoxicated and too my lucky stars were just 2 doors down from my room...I could hardly control my excitement. For the most part though, it was a quite evening and even had a nice walk on the beach at sunrise.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: b18hatch92
Reviews.Content: well i must say I did a bunch of research before going on our trip and I was quite nervous about going.....but to my surprise I was VERY satisfied with the room the service and the location of this hotel. It is in a wonderful spot and despite the small construction going on a rather nice hotel. As for the noise the lady told me that we would hear them working, but I found no such problem.... it was great, right on the beach and the people there were helpful about attractions and prices!!! I am glad that I chose this hotel as I will DEFINTALY be visiting them again soon, they have affordable rates that are definately worth paying for!!! Go there have a great time!!!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible, unprofessional,filthy, not fit for pigs!!!!”
Reviews.Author: bryanohio12
Reviews.Content: We arrived late in the evening looking forward to a weekend at the antique car show. The rather large individual at the front desk kept a mouth full of food during the entire check-in process. Finally got to room and discovered it smelly & dusty. Would have checked out but were informed we could not get a refund due to the cancellation policy. Wanted to see manager in morning. While waiting for the young man at the front desk to acknowledge my husbands presence he had to endure a story about the desk persons sexual exploits the previous evening. We were finally told that "Dan" would be available around 11:00 am. We got back around 2PM and he was gone for the day! Housekeeping never got to our room that day. I would not tell anyone to go there! It's totally disgusting!

Reviews.Title: “we loved the motel if our truck had not been towed”
Reviews.Author: mrsharleygirl
Reviews.Content: we book a week during bike week 2007 at first we loved it until the 2nd day there they towed our truck away and charged us 200.00 to get it back hotels.com gave us 85.00 back to stay somewhere elese but the motel done nothing thanks alot people

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: junniper
Reviews.Content: For the past eleven years with the exception of 1or 2 of those years due to illness in family. I have always recommended this hotel, but not anymore 1st room we had was small and dirty, after requesting a 2nd room the room was better but not up to the standard is use to be. The bathtub water would not turn off and was inconvenient to say the least. My husband and I were really disappointed, sheets were washed by us bath was cleaned by us. Please bring back the Ocean Jewels we use to know and we will keep coming back. Regretfully Bobby and Julia Dunnell Gainesville Fl. 3118 NE 11th terrace Gainesville Florida 32609 JGIORDANO5@bellsouth.net

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased ...............”
Reviews.Author: Evey_7
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the overall package at the Ocean Jewels. The staff at the front desk was very helpful and friendly. They were also very efficient and prompt when I called in a request. The Suite I had was very spacious and clean. I never saw any bugs which sometimes can be a problem when you have a kitchen in your room. I would definitely stay here again when visiting Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “No Respect”
Reviews.Author: Nortondd
Reviews.Content: Have been here before, but as soon as we checked in we were warned by other guests about a room full of 20 somethings who were drunk every night, but the real problem was that the hotel staff would do NOTHING to solve the problem. They treated all of us with total disrespect. Last stay there!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Last Minute Decision”
Reviews.Author: scorscia
Reviews.Content: We hadn't checked the reviews for this hotel because it was a spur of the moment decision. Thankfully we did not see any cockroaches and it was right on the beach, which was cool. However, the bed was very uncomfortable, the water ran in the bathroom pipes continuously, and the a/c was pretty loud too. I would not stay here again. Strangely we met folks who have timeshares in this place.

Reviews.Title: “False Advertisment At Its Best!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: spiafl
Reviews.Content: The bad reviews this hotel recieved are true. My family and I stayed at this hotel and it was doomed from the moment we checked in. The woman at the front desk was unprofessional and rude. The pictures they have on any website is to hook line and sink you! The room that was given to us was dirty and it had an odor! I went down to the front desk to request a better room, I was told that i could check in at another hotel. I travelled from Pennsylvania and my family and I was too tired to look elsewhere. Ok. Very rude! After a few attempts we got tired and annoyed and took what we felt was the better of what we have seen. Still lousy though! This room had no light in the kitchen area. The door leading to the balcony was weather beatened and was peeled and the wood was rotten at the bottom and looked as if something, (probably from the sea) had chewed at it! And last but not least, the pictures on any website, it that of rooms we learned from being there are for club members! Why would ANYONE would want to be a member of a club that offers such lousy conditions for its guests! "PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME NOR YOUR MONEY!"

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't come back here if I was paid”
Reviews.Author: manderbakah
Reviews.Content: Had one of my worst hotel experiences at this place. We were here at the beginning of June and the place was fairly empty. At first our key didn't work. It was one of the plastic cards and we fought with it for a good 20 minutes. We ended up walking across the complex about 4 times and back trying to get the card to work. No one accomidated us in any way. Not only were we put in the older section of the hotel, I seriously think we got the ghetto room. It was tiny and misshapen because one side was part of a maintenance closet. The window in the bathroom was tiny, dust, and had dead bugs in it. There were roaches in the shower. We were only sleeping there for a quick stop-over but the 5 hours I was there I wish I could have back. Normally I understand that you get what you pay for...but the room wasn't even THAT cheap!

Reviews.Title: “Do Not waste your time and money on this hotel”
Reviews.Author: BLONDIEINSC
Reviews.Content: Well to begin with when I called to make the reservation it was during Bike week. They never told me there would be an additional price to park a bike trailer on other property. They also did not tell me that bikes had to be parked in a seperate space. The Hotel Staff was very rude and very disrepectful. I would not reccomend this hotel to my worst enemy. The rooms were very old and outdated, not even a blow dryer or towels were in the room. Once again the Hotel Staff was very rude when asked what were the policies on these items. MBB Columbia, SC

Reviews.Title: “If you like Cockroaches, stay here!”
Reviews.Author: zimmazimm
Reviews.Content: This place is a total joke. They sucker you in by offering you a tremendous vacation package, but you get absolute crap! Please do not get suckered into staying here. A total hole in wall. You are better off sleeping in your car than staying at this place.

Reviews.Title: “ocean Jewels”
Reviews.Author: kater54
Reviews.Content: We also stayed there and had a marvelous time. We had an oceanview & the sunrises & sunsets were fantastic. The staff was very courteous. I know about the elevators being slow but we just hopped the stairs except for groceries from Publix. Big daddy had to wait for the elevator. We will definately return there.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: Sturm
Reviews.Content: Overall i really enjoyed my stay at Travelodge. It is a little older hotel but it was perfect for our vacation. We came from Kentucky and just wanted to relax for a week and this is the perfect place for it! The beach directly in front is not as crowded as it is toward the pier. We walked to the pier late at night with no problems. Everyone we encountered was super friendly from the staff to the other guests. Overall we had a GREAT time there and if we come back to Daytona we wouldn't have any problems at all staying there.

Reviews.Title: “Get READY for some DISAPPOINTMENT !”
Reviews.Author: LaurenTN049
Reviews.Content: okay so this hotel was a disappointment for the hotels that ive stayed at. For one thing we flew in from orlando and got there around 12:30, check - in time is 3:00 thank god we got our room early. Also the parking lot was TINY ! the elevator took forever to get to the main level or the level you were on so i say take the stairs ALOT FASTER : ) oh be ready to change your room keys every couple of hours since they kept giving us one day room keys when we were staying there 6 nights?? they seemed to have a problem with 13-15 year olds asking for a new room key because they expired!! room was relatively clean kitchenette okay note to others bring your own plates, cups etc. we got the wrong room so us teens had to get the bed from the room with two beds and put it in the living room, pull out couch was broken at the bottom ( springs were missing) the locks on the doors didnt lock if you didnt close your door hard enough it wouldnt shut all the way, easy access to the room. if you dont like the sound of fireworks going off at midnight i suggest you dont stay there because people set them off every night of our stay . The pressure in the shower wasnt so great took a long time to take a shower because of it maids didnt do too great if you were out on the balcony she only did good when you were physically gone down at the beach two pools were okay little salty pool hours were amazing for teens 6 am - 12 mid easy access to the beach if you want to go down to the pier and actually end up and the other side of the resturaunt bring money for the ride or pay up a dollar just to get to the other side the walk back to the hotel from the pier a mile away hurt the feet . if you wanted a can of soda you had to go down to the main level to get it next to the elevator which they wernt cold or in the lobby 25 cents more for cold ones the snack machine was well priced theres area for grilling which we did 4 nights of and picnic tables to sit at nice view of the ocean but i most likely wont go back because i didnt enjoy it like i wanted it to

Reviews.Title: “Nice place for the money”
Reviews.Author: jazzman89
Reviews.Content: My wife and son went over to Daytona from Orlando. Had a beautiful oceanfront Suit. What a great view of the ocean each morning. Room was spacious and beds were comfortable. Looked at the Oceanview room, but wanted to see the ocean when I got up. It was a nice place for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Okay With Problems”
Reviews.Author: jeffwday24
Reviews.Content: This motel wasn't like this when( Roger) was the manager. This place has really gone down since he has left this motel. We stayed there for seven years and never had any problems like the comments mentioned in the reviews. I fell that TravelLodge Ocean Jewels needs new management!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Jeffwday24@hotmail.com

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Place”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Terrible View Broken air conditioner with no service when requested Charged for ocean view and had to lean over balcony to see it Worn out furniture Staff with negative attitude about the view

Reviews.Title: “not sure if i will go back”
Reviews.Author: judy45LynchburgVa
Reviews.Content: I CAME FROM VA to go to the race . The motel was not what I had seen on here. The floor was not clean I had to ask for for my room to be cleaned. the locks on the door did not work that good. if you came in late you had nowhere to park.I saw the maid cleaning the room beside me and she was in there eating food that the people had in there room.the pools was fine. not sure i will stay here again. the rates are to high for what you get.

Reviews.Title: “the managers in a meeting!again for the 20th time”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: well i have got admit i was worried about the hotel after booking it through a tour group and reading some of the reveiws here on TA.The staff for the most part was extremely pleasant and did there part as much as they could to help!Johnny a front desk clerk was so wonderful do deal with and always seamed to make time to talk to us and recomend places to eat and activities to see he gave us a great tip for the "springs!"if you ever need assistance ask for johnny he will help!while we were there we wanted to part a day early due to weather,when we wnt to leave before check out time a day early he informed us that the hotels policy was " NO REFUNDS "he tryed to explain that it was out of his hands and up to his manager marshall stapp or john connors,or the managment company,when we asked to speak to the manager he went to the back office to retrieve them,and came back and told us they were in a meeting,I told jhonny that it was unprofesional to lie to the guest i mean we could see his manager just sitting there and we over heard him on his cell phone talking to some one his manager called "baby",i dont know about you but ive never had a work meeting with somebody named baby.we decided to leave and worry about our refund later.we tryed for 2 weeks straight 2-3 times a day to speak with a manager,1 evening when we called the young lady who answered said the staff was instructed to never patch a call through to the managers and all she could do was take another message! we have never in our life been treated so bad by managment at a hotel or anywhere! if the managment is this horrible how can they expect anyone to come back,johnny gave us a "key to paradise" card but sorry to say we will never go back!you cant treat people anyway you want im appaled by Marshall Stapp and John Connors,i am truelly sorry for johnny the clerk and all the employees,DO NOT STAY HERE!!

Reviews.Title: “They put the 'D' in Dump!”
Reviews.Author: Jeff-WS
Reviews.Content: I chose to disregard the negative reviews on this site and booked a one night stay on my way down to Disney from NC. I knew I had made a mistake when I pulled in the front lobby area and saw rust stains down the front of the hotel. It only got worse from there as my room was not ready for check in and I was told to return at 3:00pm. Before leaving the lobby, the desk clerk used profanity infront of my kids and slammed the phone across the desk. This outburst was over another guy behind the counter refusing to do some kind of daily count and walking out in the parking lot for a cigarette break. I returned at 3:00pm and was told my room was not ready for check in and I asked if could see the manager. I was told that I would be charged for the room if I left and he would have my room cleaned right away. Before I could get out the door, the manager called the cleaning staff and discovered my room #224 was ready. Apparently the room was clean but the "cigarette break" guy was too lasy to check. The room was in horrible shape. The sofa bed was broken and we were not allowed to change rooms. My two boys had to sleep sagging downward. The room smelled of urine and gym locker room. There were spilled food stains in the refrigerator. The bathroom had hairs on the floor. The kicker to all this was the next morning when I was not able to get into the exercise room. The "cigarette break" guy refused to give my a key at 8:00am because I was checking out that morning. I said I would just get someone to let me in and he replied the police would be called to have me removed. He actually followed me back to my room to check if I went in the exercise room on the way! The staff went out of there way to make my stay the worst in my 20 years of travel. The only positive thing I can say about this place is they are on the beach, but then there are so...... many other places to stay in Daytona are also on the beach!!!

Reviews.Title: “Some TLC required - a bit tired and shabby”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night here and really feel we payed over the odds (I booked this through a travel agent here) for what was a basic and rather shabby hotel. The pool area was untidy and the rooms were clean but nothing very special and in need of redecoration. The prime location was a plus - right on the beach - but it was some way from any actual life (admittedly we were there in May) - we had to drive quite a to find a restaurant. If we were to go back to Daytona Beach (which is unlikely) we would not stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Travelodge Hotel Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This is the worst hotel I have every stayed at in 30+ years of travelling and stayed in hotels all over the world!

HotelInfo.Name: Ocean Jewels Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 935 S. Atlantic Ave., Daytona Beach, FL 32118 (Formerly Travelodge )
